Text: My upload speed isn't very high (80kB/s maximum) so please be patient when downloading. Then enjoy this 3 part (merged into 1) series. Cheers.
Thanks very much! Appreciate your efforts.

This is basically this

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4845496/Red_Dwarf_-_Back_To_Reality_-_FEATURE_LENGTH_WITH_ADDED_LAUGHTER

renamed and reseeded. I waited for days for the original (above) torrent to fire up. In the end I got a lucky download from demonoid. It's the same content. Cheers
Please, once you've downloaded this 'edition', keep seeding for as long as possible. I can't support it forever. Cheers.

This took me 9 days to upload. There were about 28 peers. I waited until at least 20 had completed their download thinking at least a few will hang around and continue to seed. WRONG. 3 days later I check things and find 0 seeds. That's the sort of behavior I'd expect from Rimmer. Are you too going to be just another Rimmer?
